PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11212019-07-28,  ,  ,  CIRNAC,  , 
ActCanada Petroleum Resources Act
SubjectOrder Prohibiting Certain Activities in Arctic Offshore Waters
PrecisORDER PROHIBITING CERTAIN ACTIVITIES IN ARCTIC OFFSHORE WATERS in order to suspend the requirements of existing licences and freezing their terms prevents the licenses from expiring for the duration of the Order and allows Canada to move forward with a strategic review of marine and climate science in the Arctic offshore.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0280 Publication Date: 2019-08-21
